titles.title: Blockchain Technology Coordination Act of 2020
Blockchain Technology Coordination Act of 2020
To establish an office within the Department of Commerce to coordinate all non-defense related deployment and activities related to blockchain technology within the Federal Government.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Blockchain Technology Coordination Act of 2020
This bill establishes a National Blockchain Technology Coordination Office within the Department of Commerce.
